name: Life at 12:47PM
description:
A game about community, creativity and connection.

Wander around freely, listen to your community and grow inspired.


CONTROLS: WASD/Arrow Keys/Control Stick to move

CREDITS:
Designed by Duncan Corrigan
Music by Rob Hart

SPECIAL THANKS:
John Corrigan, Laura Corrigan, Lina Maria Corrigan, Paloma Corrigan Kneale, Yunjia Jiang, Monique Kemboi, Uyen Nguyen, Max Piantoni, Leura Smith, Adam Steiber, Kaveh Tabar, Shunyen Tao and all my MAGI peers

Dedicated to the friends and communities that give us the courage to play.
